values:
There are a few simple rules to be added:

1) Comment me with a reason that would make me want to add you. Like do we have something in common, know someone, or know each other from somewhere. Whatever you feel you need to write to convince me.

2. If you comment me I will comment back...as long as it does not have any rudeness behind it. I will do my best to comment on yours too as long as you comment on mine.


The Vitals
Name: Heather
Birthday: November 1
Sign: Scorpio
Hair Colour: Light brown
Eye Colour: Blue


Favourites
Colour: Pink, Green, Blue
Food: Pizza, mac and cheese, chocolate, and more
Dessert: Chocolate, half-baked ice cream
Drink: Water
Drink, Alcoholic: not much of a drinker
Movie: Facing the Giants, For Love of the Game, What a girl wants
Movie, Series: High school Musicals, Legally Blonde (they both have 2 movies haha)
Movie, Animated: The Lion King
Movie Character: depends on the move...so ask
TV Series, Current: WIldfire
TV Series, Cancelled: 8 Simple Rules, Gilmore Girls
TV Series, Animated: dont really watch animated tv series
TV Character: depends on the show
